          eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.block.db.JDBCThrottledQuery

public class JDBCThrottledQuery
extends AdvanceBlock

Query a batch of results from the datasource and return them one-by-one.

Author:
karnokd, 2012.02.22.

Method Detail

run

public hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.Observer<java.lang.Void> run()
Description copied from class: eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.runtime.Block
Schedule the execution of the body function.

The block implementations may override this method to perform any custom registration to the input ports (e.g., observe them independently.)

The returned observer will be invoked once all block run() has been called in the current realm. This entry point may be used to issue computation in case a block only uses constant inputs.

Overrides:
run in class eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.runtime.Block<eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.xml.XElement,AdvanceType,AdvanceRuntimeContext>
Returns:
the observer to trigger in the run phase

invoke

protected void invoke()
Description copied from class: eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.runtime.Block
The body function to invoke. Implementation should should invoke one of the dispatch methods when the computation is over. This may happen synchronously (or asynchronously). The input parameter values might be accessed through the getXYZ() methods or through the private params map.
